text: News24 is a news website from South Africa that uses the English language in its news. It was made in October 1998 by Naspers, a big company that deals with media around the world. About 100 journalists work for News24 which is led by editor-in-chief Adriaan Basson. They are based in Cape Town, Johannesburg, Pretoria, Durban and Gqeberha. ==References== Category:1998 establishments in Africa Category:1990s establishments in South Africa Category:News websites Category:South African culture Category:Online newspapers
title: News24 (website)
